channel.title: Non Standard Evaluation on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Non Standard Evaluation on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Scoping Rules and NSE
item.description: Earlier this week, I wrote some tweets about how you have to be careful about scopes when you do non-standard evaluation. I cover this in both Metaprogramming in R and Domain-Specific Languages in R, but this tweet Comprehensive overview of NSE. Should be of interest to @ThomasMailund @MilesMcBain @_ColinFay and @edwin_thoen https://t.co/2uI1HSnfEN — Deemah ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ (@dmi3k) September 17, 2018 made me write about it againâ€”only this time in a twitter thread. Well, I say threadâ€”I don’t actually know how to do that, it seams; I just replied to the tweet a bunch of times and apparently that doesn’t make a thread, it therefore my reply was hard to read.
